title: I got kicked from my ranked team
body:
... for maining {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:266}}{{champion:83}}  . They said these champion have no use in competetive/5x5 play. I tried to argue with them but deep inside I felt they were right about it.
Well. Thx for making toplane game restricted by {{champion:114}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:126}} only. : D
All I wanted to say. When you play "wrong" champions you can't climb 5x5 mode because... meta says it.

replies.body:
Darius always has a use, your team is stupid.

Garen i understand them.

Aatrox, he's just bad as a champ anyways( hope his mini rework will be good)

Yorick is a what if.  Can be god and basically 1v5 if you win lane or splitpush and no one can stop you.... or just lose and become useless almost.


Darius and yorick are fine.
